---
title: msbuild却提示无法找到office搞了半天还是要装个office

---


msbuild却提示无法找到"office" 搞了半天 还是要装个office

  


                       

Hi,

You just need to install the [Microsoft Office 2010 Primary Interop Assemblies (PIA)](http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=3508)[ ](http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=3508)on the build server.

Thanks

M.Radwan
